org.critterai.nmgen
Class BaseHeightfield<T>

java.lang.Object
  org.critterai.nmgen.BoundedField
      org.critterai.nmgen.BaseHeightfield<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
OpenHeightfield, SolidHeightfield
public abstract class BaseHeightfield<T>
extends BoundedField

Implements a common interface for heightfields.

At this point this class is just a convenience class..Unless is ends up serving a real purpose in the future it will likely be obsoleted.

Constructor Detail

BaseHeightfield

public BaseHeightfield(float[] gridBoundsMin,
                       float[] gridBoundsMax,
                       float cellSize,
                       float cellHeight)
                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Constructor

Parameters:
gridBoundsMin - The minimum bounds of the field in the form (minX, minY, minZ).
gridBoundsMax - The maximum bounds of the field in the form (maxX, maxY, maxZ).
cellSize - The size of the cells. (The grid that forms the base of the field.)
cellHeight - The height increment of the field.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the bounds are null or the wrong size.

BaseHeightfield

public BaseHeightfield(float cellSize,
                       float cellHeight)
Constructor - Partial

The bounds of the field will default to min(0, 0, 0) and max(1, 1, 1).

Parameters:
cellSize - The size of the cells. (The grid that forms the base of the field.)
cellHeight - The height increment of the field.

BaseHeightfield

public BaseHeightfield()
Constructor - Default

The bounds of the field will default to min(0, 0, 0) and max(1, 1, 1).

The cell size and height will default to 0.1.

Method Detail

getData

public abstract T getData(int widthIndex,
                          int depthIndex)
Returns the cell data for the provided width and depth index.

Behavior is undefined if the width or depth indices are invalid.

Parameters:
widthIndex - The width index. (0 <= index < BoundedField.width())
depthIndex - The depth index. (0 <= index < BoundedField.depth())
Returns:
The cell data for the provided width and depth index.

dataIterator

public abstract IHeightfieldIterator<T> dataIterator()
An iterator for the data contained within the field.

Returns:
An iterator for the data contained within the field.
